title: Fantastic Beasts: Mads Mikkelsen replaces Johnny Depp

title: Rocky the owl back in the wild after Rockefeller Christmas tree rescue in New York

title: Phone addiction not driven by notifications, study finds
description: Users check their phones automatically, like a smoker would light a cigarette, research suggests.

title: Covid: PPE price rises cost taxpayers £10bn, report says
